records.name: F-22 Raptor
records.description: The F-22 Raptor is a fifth-generation fighter jet known for its stealth and agility, serving as one of the most advanced fighter jets.

records.name: B-2 Spirit
records.description: The B-2 Spirit is a stealth bomber capable of penetrating dense anti-aircraft defenses and delivering nuclear payloads.

records.name: M1 Abrams
records.description: The M1 Abrams is a third-generation main battle tank that provides exceptional firepower and armor protection.

records.name: HIMARS
records.description: The HIMARS system is a high-mobility artillery rocket system capable of precise long-range targeting.

records.name: USS Gerald R. Ford
records.description: The USS Gerald R. Ford is a nuclear-powered aircraft carrier equipped with advanced technology and defensive systems.

records.name: Seawolf-class Submarine
records.description: The Seawolf-class submarine is a fast attack submarine known for its stealth and high-speed capabilities.
